Sources show 64-100% bullish positioning on structural 2026 themes (AI, infrastructure, easing cycle), but near-term technicals and hedging patterns reveal material downside risks within 1-3 weeks. Consensus view favors tactical caution despite longer-term optimism.

key_themes: Rate policy uncertainty and Fed easing trajectory (primary swing factor)
Earnings guidance deterioration and demand softness (tactical headwind)
Precious metals/cryptocurrency parabolic reversal risk (liquidation cascade potential)
Geopolitical escalation and regulatory tightening (tail risk factors)
risk_factors: VIX sustained break above 15 activates dealer hedging cascades downward in SPY/QQQ
Precious metals liquidation spreads to broader asset classes (May 2011 precedent cited: 4% SPX downside risk within 3 weeks)
Earnings guidance cuts extend beyond current scope, triggering broader multiple compression in software/enterprise/discretionary
Geopolitical escalation (Ukraine/Taiwan) triggers risk-off flows into bonds, disrupting equity positioning
Tech mega-cap momentum deterioration (NVDA/TSLA weakness) invalidates bullish structural thesis and rotates capital away from AI narrative
